name: test-source-s3
description: A simple starter to get started with gatsby-source-s3
author: Robin MÃ©tral <robin@metral.ch>

scripts.docker:start: yarn docker:clean; DOCKER_CONTENT_TRUST=0 docker run -d -p 9001:9000 -p 9002:9001 --name minio -e "MINIO_ACCESS_KEY=minioadmin" -e "MINIO_SECRET_KEY=minioadmin" -v "$(pwd)/test-data:/data" minio/minio server /data --console-address ":9001"
scripts.docker:clean: docker stop minio > /dev/null 2>&1 && docker rm minio > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo "clean"
